title: How to read 500 pages of a book in a day - Quora

response.answer_text: If it is a novel with text in what you might call normal size in a language you are very familiar with, it is possible you can finish a 500-page book in a day. If it is a non-fiction book with text in what you might call normal size in a language you are very familiar with, it is still possible you can finish a 500-page book in a day if the contents are easily understood. If the content is dense and requires breaks for thought or to consult a dictionary or other reference book, it is not going to be possible to finish a 500-page book in a day. Other factors that would have an effect” illustrations, size of text, presence of footnotes and text boxes. etc.

You don’t need to, If you aren’t feeling it. No one’s forcing you to read 500 pages a day. Read up to your understandability and capacity. No need to rush while reading something otherwise you won’t understand the actual context of the book. Don’t stress over it, If you’re ardent enough your pace will increase overtime. But,If you want to read just for the sake of showing off to your friends, Then lock yourself down in a dorm,Switch off your phone,Hide your tissues(pun intended) and other stuff and start reading. Cheers!
